data.title: Demon Slayer Season 3: See total number of episodes, when will it end
meta_keywords: Demon Slayer Season Final Episode date
data.meta_description: Demon Slayer Season 3, which has garnered numerous fans worldwide, is about to come to an end. Here is everything you need to know about the popular series episodes.
data.text:
Synopsis

Demon Slayer Season 3, which has garnered numerous fans worldwide, is about to come to an end. Here is everything you need to know about the popular series’ episodes.

The hit anime series Demon Slayer’s season 3 is currently underway. Every new episode is much anticipated in season 3 of the popular series, ‘Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba’. Its new episode will be released shortly.

The new episodes of season 3 of Demon Slayer are being showcased on Crunchyroll on a weekly basis. The series, Demon Slayer, has a huge fan following.

But there is a mystery regarding the total number of episodes in season 3. Let us see how many episodes are expected in the hit series.

Demon Slayer Season 3: How many episodes are in it?

Demon Slayer season 3 has around 11 episodes in total. These episodes are listed below.

Someone’s Dream

Yoriichi Type Zero

A Sword from Over 300 Years Ago

Thank You, Tokito

Bright Red Sword

Aren’t You Going to Become a Hashira?

Awful Villain

The Mu in Muichiro

Mist Hashira Muchichiro Tokito

TBA

TBA

Demon Slayer Season 3: When is the finale?

The finale of Demon Slayer Season 3 is expected on June 18. But there is a possibility that another episode could come. If it happens, then the series may end on June 25. Still, there is no official confirmation of Demon Slayer season 3’s culmination till now.

Demon Slayer Season 3: When to watch the new episodes?

In Japan, the episodes are released on Sundays at around 11 pm JST. For international audiences, the Demon Slayer series is being simulcasted by Crunchyroll. The episodes of the series with English subtitles are showcased after around three and a half hours of its release in Japan.

FAQs

Who has written and illustrated “Demon Slayer” manga?

Koyoharu Gotouge has written and illustrated the ‘Demon Slayer’ manga series.

When was the first Demon Slayer anime released?

It was first released on April 6, 2019.
